page.title: 04RELIGION OWERSBY'S RECTOR
page.content: The local Church of England Parish Priest is The Reverend Frank Rodgers, who lives at South Kelsey.He is the Rector of a United Benefice of six Parishes, including St.Martins, North Owersby. He is Lincolnshire born and bred,trained at Lincoln for the full- time Ministry in his early 40's,having worked 12 years in Agriculture and 16 in industry as a Railway Signalman.So what he may lack in academic learning he supplies with knowledge of life as it is. During his 5 years here he has baptised 20 (mostly babies),prepared 9 for Confirmation,married 6 couples and buried (or cremated) 8 persons. He may still be seen walking in the parish from time to time but mostly he goes from place to place by car,motoring some 8500 miles per year.He conducts 2 Sunday Services per month,usually from the Alt/ive.Ser.Bk.H/Communion Rite B.
